name: Loot it!
description:
Game
Created as a holiday gift for the "How to be a hero" community.

The game is currently under development, bugs and performance issues can happen. If you encounter one let me know in the discussion board!

In 2020 I plan to expand this game further, adding more levels and mechanics. If you like this small game please share with your friends and consider to follow me on facebook!

System requirements
I didn't tested on too many device yet. It runs smoothly on Samsung Galaxy S10 and Xiaomi Redmi Note 8. 

Any feedback is welcome!
